full-feature-open: Complete functions are open, so you are not limited by the plan
appointment-consultation: Any doubts? Make an appointment now for a free one-on-one consultation!

plan.yearly-payment-tips: Choose the annual payment plan to get more discounts
plan.avlProductNum: Number of products on the shelves
plan.appointment-tips: Limited annual payment plan is provided, and free consultation will provide you with the most customized surprise discount

payment.title: One step short, enjoy the brand's official website and one-page shop at the same time!
payment.bind-credit-card: The system will bind your credit card to ensure the continuity of your store.
payment.automatic-renewal: After the payment is completed, the system will automatically renew according to the billing method, and you can change it at any time in the account settings.
payment.try-to-swipe: In order to verify the validity of your credit card, it will try to refresh NT$1 when binding, but no actual charge will be made. After binding, the system will automatically renew the subscription according to the billing method, and you can change it at any time in the account settings.
payment.congratulation-no-payment: congratulations! Eligible for no payment after discount
payment.agree-confirm-payment: When you click OK to pay, you agree to meepShop's
payment.agree-verify-credit-card: When you verify your credit card, you agree to meepShopâ€™s

success.title: Payment succeeded!
success.description: Thank you for using meepShop, you will be redirected to the management page...

warning.title: The payment amount has been updated
warning.description: When you pay at 00:00 or 12:00, the system will re-bill you based on the remaining days.

fail.title: Payment failed, please try again
fail.description: Please check your credit card information and credit card limit before making another payment. If the payment fails again. Please contact the issuing bank.

verify-fail.title: verification failed
verify-fail.description: Please try again later or contact your issuing bank
